td.content: s:male aged 64 ys presents with mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words. patient also reports mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty with reading and writing, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he denies ever using cigarettes he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 69 in, Weight 142 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

td.content: s:pt presents with 11 days history of mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words and mild difficulty with reading and writing. pt is a 66 yo m retired. he does not smoke describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 5 years in his past o:Height 69 in, Weight 142 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
